data.text:
Bayfront MRT Station (CE1/DT16) (Republic of Singapore)

Singapore / Republic of Singapore / Bayfront Avenue

World / Singapore / Singapore / Singapore World

metro station, underground facility, MRT - Mass Rapid Transit Singapore

Upload a photo

Bayfront MRT Station (CE1/DT16) is a underground Mass Rapid Transit station located in the Marina Bay area. The station is on the Circle Line Extension between Promanade and Marina Bay. It will Interchange with the Downtown line Stage 1, formely known as the Downtown Extension when it opens in 2013. Operated by SBS Transit for the Downtown Line and SMRT for the Circle Line, It will connect the Marina Bay Sands Casino at Marina Bay to both lines, linking the casino with the MRT system This station is constructed in reclaimed land to be developed in the next ten to twenty years

Train services between Marina Bay and Promenade stations along the Circle Line were disrupted on Jan 19, 2012 at 12:08pm five days after the opening of the Circle Line Extension. SMRT said the problem was due to a signalling equipment on the track, and is investigating cause of the signalling fault

Trains service resumed 32 minutes later at,12:40pm. About 300 passengers were affected by disruption
